mapper.select: SELECT s.snack_name snackName, i.file_name fileName, i.file_type fileType, c.category_content categoryContent, s.snack_price snackPrice, s.snack_key snackKey, s.sold_out soldOut FROM snack s INNER JOIN snack_img i ON s.snack_key = i.snack_key INNER JOIN snack_category c ON s.snack_category_key = c.snack_category_key WHERE s.snack_category_key = #{categoryNo}

SELECT s.snack_name snackName, i.file_name fileName, i.file_type fileType, c.category_content categoryContent, s.snack_price snackPrice, s.snack_key snackKey, s.sold_out soldOut FROM snack s INNER JOIN snack_img i ON s.snack_key = i.snack_key INNER JOIN snack_category c ON s.snack_category_key = c.snack_category_key ORDER BY s.snack_sales DESC LIMIT 0,4}

SELECT s.snack_name snackName, i.file_name fileName, i.file_type fileType, c.category_content categoryContent, s.snack_price snackPrice, s.snack_key snackKey, s.sold_out soldOut FROM snack s INNER JOIN snack_img i ON s.snack_key = i.snack_key INNER JOIN snack_category c ON s.snack_category_key = c.snack_category_key WHERE s.snack_name LIKE %#{word}% ORDER BY s.snack_sales}

SELECT s.snack_name snackName, i.file_name fileName, i.file_type fileType, c.category_content categoryContent, s.snack_price snackPrice, s.snack_key snackKey, s.sold_out soldOut, s.snack_content snackContent FROM snack s INNER JOIN snack_img i ON s.snack_key = i.snack_key INNER JOIN snack_category c ON s.snack_category_key = c.snack_category_key WHERE s.snack_key = #{snackKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO snack_img(snack_key, file_name, file_type, file_size, origin_name)VALUES(#{snackKey}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{originName})
INSERT INTO snack(snack_name, snack_price, snack_category_key, snack_content)VALUES(#{snackName}, #{snackPrice}, #{snackCategoryKey}, #{snackContent})
mapper.select: SELECT snack_category_key snackCategoryKey, category_content categoryContent FROM snack_category
